content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you looking for plumbing, electrical, or HVAC assistance?
Yeah, it’s my sink again. This just never seems to get fixed right.
I’m sorry to hear that your sink is still causing trouble! To get started, can I have your name please?
You already have my info! I’ve called about this three times.
Thank you! I want to make sure we match your info correctly. May I please have your address for the service call?
101 Main Street. Though last time the plumber was late and didn’t help.
I have your address as 101 Main Street. I apologize again for your past experiences! Could you tell me your preferred time for the plumber to visit?
I just want someone competent and on time. Not before 10am, not after 2pm, and it can’t be anyone I’ve had here before.
Thank you! I’ll do my best to meet your preferences. I’ll check our schedule for available plumbers (excluding previous visitors) between 10am and 2pm. Are there any specific days that work for you?
I can’t plan days ahead, I need someone TODAY and only a new plumber.
Understood, I’ll check if we have a new plumber available today between 10am and 2pm.
It looks like our new plumber is available today at 11:15am. Would you like to go ahead and confirm this appointment?
Last time you said that and it was the same guy! Make sure it’s someone new. And what if he’s late again?
I assure you, this will be a different plumber. I’ll request extra attention for punctuality. If anything changes, we can notify you right away. Would you like me to book this 11:15am slot?
Fine, but if this goes wrong, I’ll never use your company again. And don’t send me any reminders, they just annoy me.
Thank you for giving us another try. I’ll book your appointment for 11:15am today with a new plumber and will not send any automated reminders as per your preference.
